original_title: Cadena Perpetua: en vivo en Obras
overview: Cadena Perpetua reached its first Obras in 2007 and left it faithfully established with a DVD and live album. The list of songs used that day remained for the memory of those who attended, including the best of the band throughout all their albums. It also has a backstage and rehearsal room days before the presentation at the stadium.
title: Cadena Perpetua: en vivo en Obras
